translation.name: English
translation.modelDescription: Select a model or enter a custom model.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Sampling temperature affects the randomness and determinism of text generated by language models. A lower temperature (like 0.2) produces more precise and deterministic text, suitable for formal documents; a higher temperature (like 0.8) makes the text more creative and varied, ideal for creative purposes. Adjusting this parameter properly can tailor the model's output to meet specific usage requirements.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: The delay between each translation request. This is used to prevent the API from being overloaded. The unit is in seconds.

key.name: API Key
key.description: You can obtain API keys at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys.
key.notify: Note: Usage is billed by the chosen provider. Please ensure your account is active and has a valid payment method.

host.name: API Host
host.description: This is typically used to bypass firewall blocking. If this application is functioning properly, there is no need to modify this setting.

presets.title: Quick Presets
presets.recommendation: Tip: If you haven't used any API before, start with OpenRouter. It offers more models and higher request limits. Use the buttons below to set defaults.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.name: Edit prompt
prompt.description: The prompt used with ChatGPT. You can modify the prompt here. Additionally, {{lang}} is used to specify the language, and {{additional}} is used for additional notes. These fields will be automatically filled in during translation. When modifying the prompt, please make sure to keep these fields intact.

multi-language.name: Bilingual Subtitles
multi-language.description: Please select whether to save the original text and the translated text simultaneously.

reset.title: Reset
reset.name: Reset all settings
reset.prompt: This will clear all settings and restore all settings to their default values. Are you sure you want to reset?

about.title: About
about.author: Developer
about.buy_me_a_coffee_description: If this project has been helpful to you, please consider buying me a cup of coffee. It will motivate me to continue the development further.
